metadata.Title: CVE-2020-7610 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: All versions of bson before 1.1.4 are vulnerable to Deserialization of Untrusted Data. The package will ignore an unknown value for an object's _bsotype, leading to cases where an object is serialized as a document rather than the intended BSON type.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> The github patch link from snyk.io shows a diff with 'serializer.js', but the description is for Deserialization. I don't know if this is intentoinal or not.

criterions.comment: node-mongodb package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
